tool_description: Maps relationships between cognate words across related languages, creating family trees and documenting sound correspondences.

root_word.description: The primary word to map cognate relationships for

cognate_list.description: Array of cognate words in related languages

language_codes.description: ISO 639-1 codes for languages corresponding to each cognate

include_reconstructions.description: Whether to include reconstructed proto-forms in the mapping

mapping_type.description: Type of relationship mapping: tree, network, linear

error_messages: Mismatched array lengths: cognate_list and language_codes arrays must have equal length.
Too few cognates: Provide at least 2 cognate words for relationship mapping.
Too many cognates: Limit cognate_list to 30 entries maximum.
Invalid language codes: All codes in language_codes must be valid ISO 639-1 codes.
Invalid mapping type: Use one of [tree, network, linear].
Unrelated languages: Some languages appear to be unrelated based on linguistic classification.
usage: Provide root_word, cognate_list, and corresponding language_codes. Optionally set include_reconstructions and mapping_type to control the relationship visualization approach.

relationship_strength.description: Strength scores (0-1) for each cognate relationship
